full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING GI CHAS 'BUL MCHOD SPRIN DANG BCAS PA NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(CES CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING GI CHAS 'BUL MCHOD SPRIN DANG BCAS PA 'DI RANG GI MOS PAS PHYAG TSAL SOGS GSAR BSKRUN GYI 'BUL TSIG RTZO MA 'DOD YOD PA NYI CHAR RTA NAG STE BA LUNG SHAR BA'I RIG RGYUD SLOB BU DBU MDZAD PHUN TSOGS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I RKYEN GYIS DAM PA'I MING 'CHANG BAS BGYIS YE SHES NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG GIS SO, ,)
